member.name: T:InTheHand.Forms.DesignMode
member.summary: Enables you to detect whether your app is in design mode in the Xamarin Forms Previewer.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.DesignMode.DesignModeEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the process is running in design mode.
member.value: True if the process is running in design mode; otherwise false.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement
member.summary: Represents an object that renders audio and video to the display.

member.summary: Identifies the AreTransportControlsEnabled dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.AutoPlayProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AutoPlay dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.BufferingProgressProperty
member.summary: Identifies the BufferingProgress dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.IsLoopingProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsLooping dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.KeepScreenOnProperty
member.summary: Identifies the KeepScreenOn dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.SourceProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Source dependency property.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.CurrentStateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CurrentState dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Position dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the Stretch dependency property.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.AreTransportControlsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the standard transport controls are enabled.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.AutoPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether media will begin playback automatically when the property is set.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.BufferingProgress
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the current buffering progress.
member.value: The amount of buffering that is completed for media content. The value ranges from 0 to 1. Multiply by 100 to obtain a percentage.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.IsLooping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that describes whether the media source currently loaded in the media engine should automatically set the position to the media start after reaching its end.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.KeepScreenOn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control should stop the screen from timing out when playing media.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets a media source on the MediaElement.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.CurrentState
member.summary: Gets the status of this MediaElement.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Play
member.summary: Plays media from the current position.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Pause
member.summary: Pauses media at the current position.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Stop
member.summary: Stops and resets media to be played from the beginning.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.Stretch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that describes how an MediaElement should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.
member.value: A value of the enumeration that specifies how the source visual media is rendered. The default value is Uniform.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.CurrentStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.MediaEnded
member.summary: Occurs when the MediaElement finishes playing audio or video.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.MediaOpened
member.summary: Occurs when the media stream has been validated and opened, and the file headers have been read.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElement.SeekCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the seek point of a requested seek operation is ready for playback.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState
member.summary: Defines the potential states of a MediaElement object.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Closed
member.summary: The contains no media. The displays a transparent frame.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Opening
member.summary: The is validating and attempting to load the specified source.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Buffering
member.summary: The is loading the media for playback. Its does not advance during this state. If the was already playing video, it continues to display the last displayed frame.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Playing
member.summary: The is playing the current media source.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Paused
member.summary: The does not advance its . If the was playing video, it continues to display the current frame.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.MediaElementState.Stopped
member.summary: The contains media but is not playing or paused. Its is 0 and does not advance. If the loaded media is video, the displays the first frame.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Forms.NavigationPage2
member.summary: Supports additional callbacks on pages exposing .

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.Stretch.None
member.summary: The content preserves its original size.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.Stretch.Fill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions. The aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.Stretch.Uniform
member.summary: The content is resized to fit in the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Forms.Stretch.UniformToFill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from the source, the source content is clipped to fit in the destination dimensions.
